snippet: Two weeks before President Xi Jinping arrived in Tanzania, Chinese buyers purchased thousands of pounds of poached tusks, which were “later sent to China in diplomatic bags on the presidential plane,” the report said.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks before President Xi Jinping arrived in Tanzania, Chinese buyers purchased thousands of pounds of poached tusks, which were “later sent to China in diplomatic bags on the presidential plane,” the report said.

headline.main: Report Implicates Chinese Officials in Smuggled Tanzanian Ivory
headline.print_headline: Report Implicates Chinese Officials in Smuggled Tanzanian Ivory
